Description.Chinese: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k).
Description.English: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.French: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.German: Erhöht das passive Handelsbudget von den Händlern und KI Mitspielern (5k bis 100k).
Description.Italian: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.Korean: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.Polish: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.Russian: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.Spanish: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)
Description.Taiwanese: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants and opponents (5k to 100k)

KnownIssues.Chinese:
Right now, as of game version 9.0, the Budget for AI merchants is bugged, only the first (EarlyGame) value is ever used, so I set it fixed to 50k for now. 
Furthermore the merchants may buy/sell everything from AI, so there is nothing left for the player. I recommend my More Passive Trade Budget + mod to prevent this.

Right now, as of game version 9.0, the Budget for AI merchants is bugged, only the first (EarlyGame) value is ever used, so I set it fixed to 50k for now.

KnownIssues.German:
Leider ist das Spiel diesbezüglich noch verbuggt (game version 9.0), sodass nur der EarlyGame definierte Wert das ganze Spiel über von Händlern verwendet wird. Daher beträgt dieser Wert, bis das gefixt ist, das ganze Spiel über 50k. 
Außerdem kaufen Händler bei hohem Budget bei der KI eventuell alles auf, sodass der Spieler dort nichts mehr kaufen/verkaufen kann, ich empfehle für Spiele mit KI Mitspielern also die More Passive Trade Budget + Variante.
